author: Tom Winter
title: More than 100 NYPD employees infected with COVID-19
description: The 129 officers and civilians are among 2,400 police department employees who are out sick.
content:
More than 100 New York Police Department employees have tested positive for COVID-19, a senior law enforcement official told NBC News.
One hundred of those infected are sworn officers, the official said. Twenty-nine are civilians. They are among more 2,400 e… [+7115 chars]
